title: Mike Wilson: A Pause that Refreshes
description: As the rally in U.S. equities takes a break, investors may want to position for "early cycle." And that means re-thinking portfolios just as downbeat economic and earnings data arrives.
itunes:title: Mike Wilson: A Pause that Refreshes
itunes:summary: As the rally in U.S. equities takes a break, investors may want to position for "early cycle." And that means re-thinking portfolios just as downbeat economic and earnings data arrives.
